DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether quality improvement intervention include rapid quality improvement , chronic care model , best practice improve diabetes care community health center whether intensive intervention enhance care .
DOC.detailed_description: In 1998 Health Resources Services Administration 's Bureau Primary Health Care begin Health Disparities Collaborative ( HDC ) improve chronic disease management community health center ( HC ) nationwide . The HDC incorporate rapid quality improvement ( QI ) , chronic care model , best practice . This study determine HDC improve diabetes care whether intensive intervention additional learning session health center , provider training behavioral change , patient empowerment material enhance care .
DOC.criteria: patient diabetes age 1875 year Pregnant woman
